Classes in org.bluez used by org.bluez
BlueZAPI
          Abstraction interface to access BlueZ over D-Bus.
BlueZAPI.DeviceInquiryListener
          Receive device discovery events.
Error.InvalidArguments
          The DBUS request does not contain the right number of arguments with the right type, or the arguments are there but their value is wrong, or does not makes sense in the current context.

Classes in org.bluez used by org.bluez.v3
Adapter
          The "Adapter" interface provides methods to access the local adapter(s).

          Abstraction interface to access BlueZ over D-Bus.
BlueZAPI.DeviceInquiryListener
          Receive device discovery events.
Error.AlreadyExists
          One of the requested elements already exists Error returned if a record for a specific procedure already exists and it has been tried create a new one.

          Hcid specific Error (Can be thrown by hcid only)
Error.Canceled
          The operation was canceled.
Error.ConnectionAttemptFailed
          An unexpected error (other than DeviceUnreachable) error has occurred while attempting a connection to a device.
Error.DoesNotExist
          One of the requested elements does not exist Error returned if a record for a specific procedure doesn't exist.
Error.Failed
          This is a the most generic error.
Error.InProgress
          Error returned if an operation is in progress.
Error.InvalidArguments
          The DBUS request does not contain the right number of arguments with the right type, or the arguments are there but their value is wrong, or does not makes sense in the current context.
Error.NoSuchAdapter
          Error returned when the requested adapter doesn't exists.
Error.NoSuchService
          No Such Service.
Error.NotAuthorized
          Error returned when the caller of a method is not authorized.
Error.NotAvailable
          Error returned when a specified record is not available.
Error.NotConnected
          The remote device is not connected, while the method call would expect it to be, or is not in the expected state to perform the action.
Error.NotInProgress
          Not In Progress Hcid specific Error (Can be thrown by hcid only)
Error.NotReady
          Error returned when the adapter is DOWN.
Error.OutOfMemory
          Error returned when a memory allocation via malloc() fails.
Error.Rejected
          Rejected Hcid specific Error (Can be thrown by hcid only)
Error.RequestDeferred
          Hcid specific Error (Can be thrown by hcid only)
Error.UnsupportedMajorClass
          Unsupported Device Class Hcid specific Error (Can be thrown by hcid only)
Manager
          This interface provides methods to list the available adapters, retrieve the default local adapter path and list/activate services.
